features.randomized-keys: Generates completely random keys consisting of uppercase letters and numbers, ensuring uniqueness in each instance.
features.segmented-format: Outputs the key in a structured format, divided into four segments (e.g., ABCD-1234-EFGH-5678) with each segment containing 4 characters.
features.lowercase-conversion: Returns the key in all lowercase format for consistent styling and easy integration into systems requiring lowercase input.
features.cryptographic-security: Utilizes Node.js's 'crypto' module for secure random byte generation, ensuring high levels of randomness.
features.customizable: Can be easily extended to modify the length of segments, the number of segments, or the character set used.

design.simplicity: Designed to be lightweight, the package offers an easy-to-use API with a single exported function, allowing developers to quickly integrate the functionality.
design.modularity: The package is designed with extensibility in mind, enabling developers to adjust or enhance key generation behavior according to their needs.
design.reliability: Leveraging native Node.js modules, this package ensures reliable performance and randomness even in high-scale applications.
